content.rendered:
Directed by Vysakh

Written by Udaykrishnan

Cast Mammootty (‘Madhura’ Raja). Jai (Chinna Raja). Jagapathi Babu (V.R. Nadesan). Anusree (Vasanthi). Siddique (Rajendra Babu). Mahima Nambiar (Meenakshi). Vijayaraghavan (Krishnan). Nedumudi Venu (Madhavan Nair). Reshma Rajan (Lizy). Salim Kumar (Manoharan Mangalodayam). Shamna Kasim (Amala). Sunny Leone (Dancer (Cameo)). Bijukuttan (Vasu). Ramesh Pisharody (News Channel Cameraman). Baiju Ezhupunna (Chandru). Santhosh Keezhattoor (Paulose). Noby Marcose (Pothan). Kailash (Resool). Suraj Venjaramoodu (Sugunan (as Suraaj Venjarammoodu)). Aju Varghese (Suru). Kalabhavan Shajohn (Perumal) .Said Alharbi. Aniyappan (Drunkard). Ponnamma Babu (Face dupe of TV kallan Mammadutty). Baby (Villager). Jayan Cherthala (Chandra Mohan). Balachandran Chullikadu (Raja’s Lawyer). M.R. Gopakumar (Balan). Nelson Ipe (Nelson). John Kaippallil (Dr. Rishi). Thezni Khan (Ramani). G. Suresh Kumar (Koshy). Mary (Villager). Narayanan Nair (NCS Member). Parvathy Nambiar (Daisy). Narain (Balachandran). Chali Pala (Udumbu Vasu). Nandu Poduval (Villager). Vinaya Prasad (Lillykutty (as Vinaya Prakash)). Alexander Prasanth (Cleetus). Priyanka (Leela). Charan Raj (Maniyannan). Karate Raja (Raja assistant). Angel Shijoy (Shamna Kasim (voice)). R.K. Suresh (David). Baiju V.K.(Raveendran)

Languages Malayalam

Producers V.A. Thajudeen

Production Nelson IP
